entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 11:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
